body_html:
Just ran into the same problem. Running torch.save(scheduler, filename) produces the following error:
cPickle.PicklingError: Can't pickle <type 'function'>: attribute lookup __builtin__.function failed
I'll appreciate it if I could save the state_dict of a scheduler.

body:
Just ran into the same problem. Running `torch.save(scheduler, filename)` produces the following error:
`cPickle.PicklingError: Can't pickle <type 'function'>: attribute lookup __builtin__.function failed`
I'll appreciate it if I could save the state_dict of a scheduler.
